bug.short_desc: A newer version of the "Noto Color Emoji" font seems to be available
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
On Fedora 25 we have:
$ ll /usr/share/fonts/google-noto-emoji/NotoColorEmoji.ttf -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 2583936 5月 6 2016 /usr/share/fonts/google-noto-emoji/NotoColorEmoji.ttf
The current version which I downloaded from https://www.google.com/get/noto/ is more than twice as big:
$ ll /home/mfabian/.fonts/noto/NotoColorEmoji.ttf -rw-r-----. 1 mfabian mfabian 5987004 10月 20 11:46 /home/mfabian/.fonts/noto/NotoColorEmoji.ttf
And when testing it I found that it renders some emoji made up of more than one character (like a base character followed by a skin tone) correctly which the older font did not render correctly.
So it would be nice to have an update for Fedora.
